articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Madonna's North American concerts postponed as singer recovers - Reuters
articles.description: Pop superstar Madonna said on Monday that all of the North American dates on her upcoming tour will be postponed while she recovers from a multi-day hospitalization for a serious infection.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES, July 10 (Reuters) - Pop superstar Madonna said on Monday that all of the North American dates on her upcoming tour will be postponed while she recovers from a multi-day hospitalization f… [+1157 chars]
